attributes.action: Why should a father pay again in court if the Mother breaks a court order.
attributes.background: took my ex partner to court to see my daughter and paid for everything now my ex has broke court order, and yet again i have to cover all costs to gain access again.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
